title: Homemade Truffle Butter
directions: In a small bowl, mix together the butter and 1 tsp. truffle oil. Taste and add more oil, 1 tsp. at a time, according to intensity desired, up to about 3 tsp.
Add Fleur de Sel to taste.
If adding summer truffles, chop 2-3 slices finely and add to mixture at this time.
Spoon butter onto a sheet of plastic wrap and form into a log, about 1 inch thick.
Wrap log tightly and place in the fridge, until ready to use.
*Uses: on a grilled steak, melted over cauliflower or brussel sprouts, in any mushroom dish, in risotto, over pasta ,on popcorn, in an omelette
ingredients: O&CO. Summer Truffle in Olive Oil
